origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EconomicAPI.get_policy_data', 'description': 'This function retrieves economic policy data based on the country and type of policy.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'country', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The country for which the policy data is requested.'}, {'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of economic policy, e.g., fiscal, monetary.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policyData', 'description': 'The economic policy data for the specified country and policy type.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EconomicAPI.get_policy_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'country'是'USA', 'policyType'是'fiscal'.
